You stare wide-eyed and slack-jawed as your recently declared girlfriend was, entirely out of left field, sprouting like a weed. The blonde-haired woman shared a similar expression of bewilderment while her height rocketed past ten feet. She staggered back when she hit twenty feet, and fell flat on her blue-clad butt at thirty feet. By forty feet, the teen was just waiting for it to end, her back lying on the sand. Alex kept on growing, until she peaked at a height of fifty feet.

“Alex, are you okay?!” You called out.

It took a few seconds for the metahuman to get over her shock and get to her feet before responding. “Yeah, but how did this happen?!” Then her stomach growled, forcing her to clutch it with her hands. “And why do I feel really hungry?”

Suddenly, the jingle of an Ice Cream truck rang in your ears and you turn around to see the vehicle stationed adjacent to a quartet of children. Apparently, Alex also saw it, because she walked over to the parked pink automobile, each step creating trembles in the ground. The kids fumbled from the miniature tremors, and, upon laying eyes on the source of them, screamed and scattered. Alex was too concerned with alleviating her appetite to notice this, as well as the driver of the cold confection-carrying car, who followed the preadolescents’ example. She plucked off the lock to the back doors with the thumb and index finger and moaned as the alluring aroma of the frozen dairy products flowed into the nostrils. A thin line of drool leaked from her mouth, and Alex picked up the truck with her hands with the same ease as she would with a toy. Lifting it to her face, you see her tilt the locomotive toward her, sending gallons of ice cream down her mouth. After shaking the truck a couple times to get out any remaining dessert, Alex gently sat it back on the ground and gulped her meal down her throat.

Your astonished demeanor makes reappearance. “Did that just happen?”

Another sharp gurgle emanated from Alex’s belly, one that you could clearly hear despite being several yards away. However, this sounded different from before, perhaps not occurring out of a lack of food, but of a surplus. The super-sized superhuman placed her left hand on her slightly distended stomach as the gurgling migrated up her body. You had a good idea of what was going to transpire next and dreaded it.

“*BBBBUUUUUUURRRRPPPPPPP!*”

Catching her by surprise, a fittingly colossal belch pierced Alex’s lips, forcing them to flap frantically. Its scent consisted of partially digested ice cream, chili, and stomach acid, which you could tell because it exited her esophagus as an emerald fog that wafted around her in a wide radius that you were unfortunately within the boundary of. One unintentional whiff made you collapse to the sand with nauseated jade cheeks, a right hand pinching your nose in a vain attempt to block out the odor, and a left hand clasping your mouth to keep the vomit at bay. You were practically begging her to fart on you again as opposed to letting out another one of those abhorrent oral eruptions. Nevertheless, the smell was not the only major characteristic of her boisterous burp. It possessed enough power to shatter every panel of glass within a city block and cause yet another tremor that surpassed those made by her footsteps. Her enormous eructation was so loud that you feared the possibility of going deaf, even if you could cover your ears. You prayed that this would end eventually, and thankfully, it did after a grand total length of 15 seconds.

Once you force back down your lunch, you survey the area for any potential damage. However, the stink cloud continued to linger and severely limited your visibility, even though it was slowly dissipating. Alex was still largely visible, no doubt owed to her new stature. You could see her holding her hands to her mouth and blushing heavily. Being a tomboy, Alex was not exactly uncomfortable engaging in masculine behavior, but even she was repulsed by her display.

Austin's POV:
Austin's world was spinning, his best friend Ally's piano playing had caused her to bash him under-finger several times, so he didn't notice when Ally saw him. Well, Ally didn't see him. She saw what she thought was a bug.

"EWW!" Ally screamed, jumping back and swatting the 'bug' off of her piano. Just as Austin had regained his senses, they were bashed out again as he was sent flying off the keyboard and on to the floor. As he senses returned (thankfully faster this time) he was shocked that he was even alive based on how big the fall was to him. But a looming shadow reminded him of his more... immediate problem.

Ally's POV:
Ally shivered, she couldn't believe she'd just been touching a bug, why was it on her piano? why didn't it crawl away after she first touched it?
'oh no' she thought 'what if i hurt it!'. Ally wasn't the violent type, heck, the worst prank she could come up with was a kick me sign stuck to someone's back! so the idea she hurt it, even if it was just a bug, wasn't a pleasant one.
She looked around for it, spotting it fairly quickly, but it wasn't moving much. 'aw man, it looks really hurt! well, what do you do if you find a hurt animal?' she thought to herself, already knowing the answer.
She looked down pitifully at the insect and took a deep breath. 'You put it out of it's misery.'
She looked down at her feet, she was wearing her favorite pink flats, she didn't often wear them often and as much as she wanted to put the bug out of it's misery, she wasn't sure if she wanted to have it's body splattered to the sole of her shoe.
'maybe i could do it barefoot? I mean, it'll probably be softer and more comfortable for it that way...' she told herself in her head, trying to make herself feel better about it.

Austin looked up at the gigantic Ally and blushed, even at this huge size he still thought she looked extremely pretty, especially her face.
Wait, her face? Austin was shocked, she looked... concerned? Did she know it was him? Did she figure it out!?
Suddenly Ally's feet began to move, as she started slipping her feet out of her pink flats. 'Why is she...' Austin thought to himself "hey Ally why are you taking your shoes off?" he asked. "OK LIL' GUY!" Ally started, her voice being much louder for Austin "J-JUST STAY STILL AND I'LL TRY AND MAKE THIS QUICK, ALRIGHT?"

'I've gotta run...' Austin thought to himself 'But, how can I? her foot is so big, what's the point?' Austin pondered whether to run for his life, or give up.

132332111.content:
Betty was in her science class, doing an experiment with Archie. She puts a drop of liquid in the vial as he watches and it starts to bubble.

“Betty, Lab Coat.” the teacher calls, as she is in her regular clothes.

She sighs. “Ok, one second.” she turns around and-
132332111.title: Betty’s Experiment

choices: Betty continues to feel odd.. (Slow growth)
Suddenly, Betty gets big! (She takes up the room)
Even more of a boost in size! (Mega)
1323321111.content:
Betty walks by the teacher's desk where there is a stack of lab coats. As she gets close, the vial in the class experiment bubbles and changes colors. Everyone watches in amazement until the teacher cries out.

"Watch out!" The teacher yells and everyone screams, ducking into the nearest desk they can find. Betty panics, she begins to run past the table with the smoking vial, but as she almost passes it, the vial explodes.

"Betty!" Archie yells out her name. He rushes to see if Betty is okay but the teacher holds him back. There is smoke everywhere, and it is thickest where Betty had been standing. The fire alarm in the classroom begins to blare, and everyone coughs as they leave the classroom.

"I have to find Betty! Hey!" But the teacher holds tighter to Archie. "Don't be stupid! Something went wrong, we can't breathe it in..."

"Hey!" The voice calls out as the smoke begins to clear out of the room.
"I am okay," Betty walks outside of the classroom where her relieved classmates, including Archie and the teacher are glad she's okay.

"Let's get you all checked out, just in case. I'll have the nurse come by."

Betty isn't feeling so well. She follows everyone around, nervous that she is going to cause a health scare if she says something.

"We'll be entering in alphabetic order..."
1323321111.title: The class experiment goes haywire

choices: (Gentle) Veronica keeps the shrunken man as a pet... for now
(Indifferent) Avoiding a mess, she stashes the shrunken man somewhere in her roo
(Evil) Just like her father taught her, there can be no witnesses
13233212.content:
Veronica Lodge was noticeably excited at school. She could barely contain herself, desperate to get through the snoozefest of her classes to get home and check the mail before anyone else did.

         "What's got you so riled up, Princess Lodge?" Cheryl Blossom said with a smirk as they ate lunch with Jughead, Betty, and Archie.
Veronica grinned back deviously. "Oh nothing, just waiting on something in the mail." Jughead nudged Archie and the two boys chuckled to themselves. It was going to be fun, of course, but her boyfriend had no idea what he was in for.
         It had all started a couple of weeks ago when Veronica was bored online, the gang was in downtime with no mysteries to solve so she had plenty of time to daydream. She remembered years ago hearing from her friend in New York about a fabled shrinking powder that ruthless mobsters would use on their victims for extortion or if need be, to put them out of business permanently. But for Veronica, it was nothing evil that she had in mind. As the daughter of the most powerful man in Riverdale, she too was attracted to the idea of being a god, if at least until the shrinking wore off. Besides, she was sure it would be a lot of fun for Archie too!
         After a bit of identity theft (pretending to be her notorious father Hiram Lodge) and stealing his personal black book, Veronica found a contact overseas through the dark web. She eagerly checked the mailbox every day after school until one day, there it was: an unmarked plain-looking box. She picked it up and noticed there was a tear in it, as if someone had been inspecting it thoroughly.

         Veronica looked around the driveway to make sure no one was watching. Oddly enough the mail truck was still parked outside. Once she went inside, she tore open the package. The powder was divided into five small vials, one of which was completely empty! Go figure, you buy something off an illegal website and they rip you off. She checked her room for the perfect place to stash the powder as if it was illicit drugs, when suddenly she felt an insect bite on her ankle.

         "Ow! Stupid ant..." Veronica swatted at her leg and to her surprise, heard a pained yowl and a curious feeling on the palm of her hand. Looking closer, she saw what was a miniature man in a mail delivery outfit, mouthing for help and looking beat up. He must've thought the powder was drugs, taken a cut of it, and then had to cling onto her pant leg to get inside. Veronica felt a little bad, she had been walking around barefoot and felt something crunch against her foot but imagined it was something insignificant like a twig.
         "Ugh bugman, you shouldn't have stolen from me.. This stuff is really expensive..." Veronica thought about what to do with her first unintended recipient of her experiments.
13233212.title: Riverdale: Shrunk by Veronica!

choices: Continue story from the captive's POV
Continue story with Veronica, ready to use the powder on someone else
Veronica's mom, Hermione, comes into the room looking to borrow something
132332122.content:
"72 hours! That's how long you're going to be shrunken for since you snorted up my shrinking powder!"

         Veronica read the fine print of her product, while glaring at the tiny captive she had reluctantly acquired. He had taken quite a beating but fortunately for him (and her), she hadn't been wearing boots or he'd be a smushed up blot on the bottle of her heel.

         "I don't have time to take care of you until you grow bigger, so I'm just going to put you somewhere safe for now." Veronica looked around the room. She picked up the small mailman in her hand and grinned deviously. Holding him tightly in her fist, she walked over to one of her many drawers. In true Lodge fashion, her parents are bought her all the clothes and material goods that she could ever want. She had a whole drawer dedicated to her intimates.
         Plop! The little man did a squeal as she carelessly dropped him onto the soft bedding of her many panties and thongs. It was almost too good for him, she thought. But at least everything was clean and it was better than having him wander and get accidentally crushed.

         "Alright you little nuisance," Veronica glared. "I'm off to Pop's, I'll find a way to release you when I get back. Don't get into too much trouble playing with my underwear!" She winked and the last thing the man would see was her beautiful face before he was plunged into the darkness of the drawer.
132332122.title: Tossed aside for now

132332211.content:
Elena Gilbert was in class, listening to the new proffesor talk. She didn’t know much about the subject, being she was constantly zoning out. She glances across the room, looking for any familiar face.

Earlier that day, Elena had been in her dorm room. She walked across the room and caught a glimpse of something strange on an end table next to her bed. Looking at it, it was a bottle of some sort. Curious as she was, she twisted the cap off and took just a sip, before forcefully swallowing the bitter taste and scowling. A shiver coursed through her body, but she decided to shrug it off and study

Suddenly, she felt the same shiver, except for it wouldn’t go away. Did someone poison her? The person next to her glanced at her, sporting a look of fear as she felt her clothes tighten. “What’s happening?” she whispered, as she heard a sound of the seams on her jeans tearing, as her sleeves rode farther up her arms.

“You’re- growing.” said the guy she asked

Rips and tears began forming in the shoulders of the fabric as her shoulders extended further across. She sprouted taller, and none of her friends were there to help, as her view was above all of her classmates and her feet bursted out of her shoes, catching the attention of a professor.

“No- this can’t be happening,” she exclaimed as everyone in the room was now paying attention to her growing spectacle
132332211.title: Elena

info.brief_description: Girls grow or guys shrink from TV show. (No cartoons in this one, sorry)
